settings.custom_liquid:
Rosacea sufferers often look for a quick and effective way to control their symptoms,

but the available treatment options can be difficult to sort through. At first, over-the-counter and prescription products may offer temporary relief from the burning and itching symptoms of Rosacea. Unfortunately, many remedies contain harsh chemicals that can actually aggravate your condition if used regularly. You feel like you are trapped in a cycle. You want to get rid of your rosacea but don't want the side effects associated with most prescription medications. You take prescription medicine, your rosacea clears-up but then you get a whole host of negative side-effects. You stop the treatment; your rosacea flares-up and the cycle begins again. This is because they use harsh chemicals to treat rosacea and in turn this leads to dryness and irritation. We need to focus on creating new, healthy cells for healthy skin not damaging the cells even further. That's why people are increasingly turning to more-natural methods for treating Rosacea, our scientists believe that the best approach for your skin is through natural treatment, which uses natural ingredients to help reduce your symptoms and control your flare-ups. These treatments have no side-effects. They do not use harsh chemicals to combat rosacea therefore they do not damage your skin in order to improve the condition. At Seacra, we've created an innovative skincare solution using red algae to prevent these damaging side effects and help you achieve the clear skin you want.

Why Natural Treatments?

If you think about it logically, rosacea is a skin condition that makes your skin sensitive. Your skin is more sensitive than others and more affected by external environmental parameters. If you have sensitive skin, there would be guidance around using cleaning products with strong chemicals in them such as detergent, as this may make your hands flare up – this is the same for your face. When you introduce harsh chemicals into your skin, you disrupt its natural balance, leading to dryness and other issues. People with rosacea-prone skin often have difficulty finding products that don't irritate their skin and still meet their skincare needs. We want to break the cycle of bad skin. With our innovative red algae gel.

Rosacea Natural Treatment
  • Antioxidants.
    •  Exposure to environmental stressors such as UV rays, smoke and chemicals can cause your skin's cells to produce excessive amounts of reactive oxygen species (ROS). This overproduction may trigger inflammatory skin diseases like Rosacea. Antioxidants can be your best weapon against ROS.

    Red Algae contains one of the most powerful antioxidants—Astaxanthin. This substance is six thousand times more effective than Vitamin C at neutralising free radicals and 550 times better than Vitamin E in this respect.

  • Anti-inflammatories
    • Anti-inflammatories are a second important part of treating rosacea. People with Rosacea have higher levels of an inflammatory mediator called cathelicidins, which are part of the skin's defense system. Red Algae contains bioactive compounds that can inhibit the production of pro-inflammatory cytokines and reduce the expression of inflammatory genes. This makes it an effective rosacea treatment.

    One of the most important things to include in your rosacea skincare routine is skin nutrients. Our bodies are like sponges: they absorb the things we put into them. If we consume unhealthy food and chemicals, our bodies will not be healthy—and diseases will manifest themselves.

    However, if we keep our bodies healthy and well-nourished, they are better equipped to heal themselves from rosacea or any other skin condition.

    Red Algae is basically a superfood for your skin – containing higher quantities of all those medically charged buzzwords such as Azelaic acid but with no side-effects. Forget treatments that cause redness and dryness, flare-ups or even raging sensitivity: think about something sustainable—both physically and mentally.

    Our Recovery & Repair gel contains, in addition to Red Algae, Jojoba oil, Chamomile and Calendula, all of which have been proven effective against several skin conditions including rosacea. .

More and more people with rosacea are choosing to treat their condition naturally rather than using prescription medication. There are three components you should look for in a rosacea treatment; Antioxidants, anti-inflammatories and nutrients. Red algae has them all.
